description:
The law firm of Brown Kiely, LLP has built a reputation over the last 20 years as a premier civil litigation firm in Bethesda, Maryland. We have always been a boutique firm and pride ourselves in our dedication to the human beings behind each case, rather than treating each person as a case number. We handle a wide range of personal injury and medical malpractice matters, in addition to estate planning and business and commercial litigation.

Our legal team has significant experience in such personal injury matters as motor vehicle accidents, large truck crashes, construction accidents, brain injuries, nursing home abuse, birth injuries, premises liability, mesothelioma, toxic mold exposure, class action lawsuits and wrongful death. Having worked closely with clients who were seriously injured or impacted by large corporations and insurance companies, we are aware of the tactics companies use to avoid liability, and our law firm is prepared to address these challenges. Our clients appreciate our tireless approach and our unwillingness to back down in the face of vigorous opposition.

We are committed to compassion and customer satisfaction with every case, whether we are preparing for a high-profile medical malpractice trial or assisting a family with writing a will or creating a trust. Clients can rely on us to answer phone and email inquiries promptly and honestly, in addition to educating them on the legal process before we face the opposition. We accept credit cards at the law firm of Brown Kiely, LLP and we welcome clients to discuss their case with us during a free initial consultation.
